name: A sallow yellow sash
data: It decreases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution like a god.
It decreases the users charisma adequately.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
Gastric fumes rumble within the sash.
